title: Naughty moussaka
ingredients: ['2 large aubergines', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'olive oil', '1 large onion, sliced', '500g lamb mince', '1 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 lamb stock cube dissolved in 300ml water', '2 eggs', '250ml single cream', '100g Cheddar cheese, grated']
